channel.title: Data Recovery on Tech Notebook
channel.description: Recent content in Data Recovery on Tech Notebook

item.title: Foremost: Recover Deleted Data
item.description:
Introduction link

Foremost is a forensics application to recover files based on their headers, footers, and internal data structures. Foremost can work on image files, such as those generated by dd, Safeback, Encase, etc, or directly on a drive. This short article shows how you can use foremost to recover deleted files.

I do not issue any guarantee that this will work for you!

Currently foremost can recover the following file types:

item.title: Scalpel: Recovering Deleted Data
item.description:
Introduction link

Scalpel is a tool that allows you to recover files and folders that have been deleted from your hard drive.

Resources link

  • Recover Deleted Files With Scalpel
